name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--owens-osborne;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Owens Osborne)

testSteps.description: Given that Owens Osborne gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Owens Osborne visits the conference page
Owens Osborne opens the browser at "/"
Owens Osborne maximises the browser window
Owens Osborne wants to register
Owens Osborne clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 2 early tickets for the talks

children.description: Owens Osborne buys a quantity of 2 early tickets for the talks
Owens Osborne buys a quantity of 2 tickets of type early
Owens Osborne clicks on the Talks tab
Owens Osborne enters 2 into the Number of Early Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 3 tickets for the workshop Workshop B

children.description: Owens Osborne buys a quantity of 3 for the workshop Workshop B
Owens Osborne buys a quantity of 3 tickets of type Workshop B
Owens Osborne clicks on the Workshops tab
Owens Osborne enters 3 into the Number of Workshop B Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Owens Osborne, deborahAguirre, deborahaguirre@panzent.com, 23/10/1988, ZYTREK, 267 Ocean Avenue - Itmann - New Jersey - 1749, Greenwich, 81335, France

children.description: Owens Osborne fills the registration form with his Owens Osborne, deborahAguirre, deborahaguirre@panzent.com, 23/10/1988, ZYTREK, 267 Ocean Avenue - Itmann - New Jersey - 1749, Greenwich, 81335, France
Owens Osborne scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Owens Osborne clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Owens Osborne enters Owens Osborne into the Actor's Fullname
Owens Osborne enters deborahAguirre into the Actor's Nickname
Owens Osborne enters deborahaguirre@panzent.com into the Actor's Email
Owens Osborne picks the date 23/10/1988 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Owens Osborne enters ZYTREK into the Actor's Company
Owens Osborne enters 267 Ocean Avenue - Itmann - New Jersey - 1749 into the Actor's Address
Owens Osborne enters Greenwich into the Actor's City
Owens Osborne enters 81335 into the Actor's Zip
Owens Osborne selects "France" from the Actor's Country
Owens Osborne clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Owens Osborne checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
